hints.title: Sinh Inequality
hints.section: ## PART A: Potential Energy Reduction (🚧 INCOMPLETE)
hints.raw_directive:
225: **Apply the global sinh inequality**:
226: 
227: :::{prf:lemma} Sinh Inequality
228: :label: lem-sinh-bound-global
229: 
230: For all $z \in \mathbb{R}$:
231: 
232: $$
233: \frac{\sinh(z)}{z} \geq 1
234: $$
235:
